snippet.title: Agon the Mysterious Codex Trailer JA
snippet.description: The AGON story starts in 1903. Professor Samuel Hunt, a historian at the British Museum is living the peaceful life of a scientist in London until one day hes chosen by mysterious forces for an extraordinary mission. The AGON story starts when the Professor receives a secretive anonymous message and the first page of an old codex, challenging him to find twelve places of the world where the last masters of the lost games live. Professor Hunt begins his long-lasting journey in search of the AGON.
